QuestData.Title: The Activation Rune
QuestData.Description: This colossal being appears to be inactive. You notice an empty rune-shaped slot on its chest.$B$BPerhaps you might be able to find the missing rune inside the nearby overlook.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Omega Rune inside the Shaper's Terrace and bring it to The Etymidian.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The rune-shaped slot on The Etymidian's chest appears to glow with faint power.>
QuestData.RewardText: <You hear the rumbling sound of stone grinding as The Etymidian's limbs come to life.>$B$BI am needed somewhere?
